clients.title: Market Your Services to Specific Cities With Targeted Locality Pages
clients.description: A great way to extend your websiteâ€™s reach in specific cities or towns is to create locality pages that target potential clients who live in those places. Locality pages focus on how your firm can help residents of a particular geographic area with their legal questions and issues. When creating locality pages, always include information that is relevant to people looking for legal assistance and try to avoid generic information about a location. Doing so helps your site reach potential clients in surrounding areas that are less competitive but could still generate quality leads.

jld.title: Showcase Your Legal Insights
jld.description: Justia Annotations allows attorneys to add background information, plain language explanations, and legal analysis to Justia's free case law for the benefit of the public. By participating in this service, your name will appear as a Contributor in the sidebar of every case you annotate. Show off your knowledge to prospective clients; start annotating today.
